trans-unit.source: Hosts a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window as an element within [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Verter en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet som et element i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] innhold.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window, create a class that derives from HwndHost.
trans-unit.target: Skal være vert for en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet oppretter en klasse som er avledet fra HwndHost.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A> method and create your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window as a child of the parent window that is passed into the method.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A>metoden og opprette den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet som underordnet for det overordnede vinduet som er sendt til metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Although HwndHost derives from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, various properties of HwndHost that come from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and other intermediate classes such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not generally mapped to possible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalents.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Selv om HwndHost er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, ulike egenskaper for HwndHost som kommer fra <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>og andre mellomliggende klasser som <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>vanligvis ikke er tilordnet til mulig [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] tilsvarende.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Also, not all <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> / <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> input events transfer across the interoperation boundary.
trans-unit.target: Heller ikke alle <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>/ <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>inndata hendelser overføring på tvers av interoperation grensen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: HwndHost derives from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> primarily so that an HwndHost instance can be inserted into the widest variety of possible content models, and so that default <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> layout characteristics can apply.
trans-unit.target: HwndHost er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>primært slik at en HwndHost-forekomst kan settes inn i det største utvalget mulig innhold modeller og og som derfor som standard <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>oppsettet egenskaper kan bruke.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: For more details on HwndHost, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om HwndHost, kan du se [WPF og Win32 bruken](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Denne typen eller medlemmet er ikke tilgjengelig i sonen Internett sikkerhet.
